meanings.sent1: The small crack in the wall was inapparently hidden behind the painting.
meanings.sent2: The treasure was inapparently buried deep underground.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was inapparently simple yet astonishing.
meanings.sent4: Her true feelings were inapparently masked by a smile.
meanings.sent5: The stars were inapparently twinkling in the night sky.

meanings.definition: In a way that is not easily seen or noticed.
meanings.sent1: The ninja moved inapparently through the shadows.
meanings.sent2: She inapparently slipped out of the room without anyone noticing.
meanings.sent3: The cat inapparently crept up on the unsuspecting mouse.
meanings.sent4: Time inapparently slipped away as they lost themselves in conversation.
meanings.sent5: The thief inapparently vanished into the crowded street.
